title: Test 1 - Phần 5 - Chọn đúng dạng của từ

questions.text: She stared in ________ at the beautiful sunset. [amaze]
He ________ refused to go to the party. [absolute]
The dress she wore was beautifully ________ with flowers and leaves. [pattern]
Despite his best efforts, he was ________ in winning the race. [success]
The ________ of the trip was more than he had expected. [expensive]
The colours of the old photograph had ________ over time. [fade]
